snippet: Israeli forces responded after five Israeli soldiers were injured in an explosion while they were destroying a tunnel from Gaza into Israel.
abstract: Israeli military strikes kill four Palestinian militants from military wing of Hamas after five Israeli soldiers are wounded in explosion near Israel-Gaza border; incident marks deadliest confrontation in the area in a year.

byline.original: By ISABEL KERSHNER and FARES AKRAM
byline.contributor: Isabel Kershner reported from Jerusalem, and Fares Akram from Gaza.

lead_paragraph: Israeli forces responded after five Israeli soldiers were injured in an explosion while they were destroying a tunnel from Gaza into Israel.

headline.main: Israeli Strikes in Gaza Kill 4 Hamas Militants
headline.print_headline: Israeli Strikes in Gaza Kill 4 Hamas Militants
